sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
A monitory and hortatory letter to those English who debauch the Indians by selling strong drink unto them written at the desire of some Christians to whom the mischiefs arising from that vile trade are matters of much apprehension and lamentation. Mather, Cotton, 1663-1728.
16 p.
[s.n.], Boston, N.E. : Printed in the year 1700.
Attributed to Cotton Mather by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints. Reproduction of original in the Library of Congress.
=======
